sentence: Center Brian Allen could have his hands full with defenders in the middle.

sentence: Both have free agents of their own to worry about, whether it's edge-rusher Von Miller and center Brian Allen in Los Angeles or linebacker De'Vondre Campbell and cornerback Rasul Douglas in Green Bay.
